Package org.rapla.mobile.android.activity

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AllocatableDetailsActivity
    The allocatable details screen allows the user to book an allocatable of the previously selected allocatable category.
    AllocatableListActivity
    The allocatable list screen allows the user to select a specific category then the screen will call a detail screen with all resources which are belong to chosen category.
    AppointmentDetailsActivity  
    AppointmentListActivity
    The appointment list screen allows the user to show, add, edit and display all appointments assigned to the current reservation.
    BaseActivity
    The base activity class provides methods and logic that is required across multiple activities of this application.
    BaseActivity.TitleBarIconOnClickListener
    Click listener that starts the home activity.
    BrowserGatewayActivity
    This activity handles the integration with the HTML5 calendar view plugin.
    DummyHomeActivity
    This screen allows the user to show all reservations assigned to him.
    EventDetailsActivity
    This screen shows the basic data of a reservation.
    EventDetailsActivity.DialogConfirmDeleteListener
    Listener for the ok button of the confirm delete reservation dialog.
    EventDetailsActivity.EventTypeItemSelectedListener
    Listener class for the event type selecion to update the list view with dynamic attributes based on the selected dynamic type
    LoginActivity
    The login screen is only shown at the first time when the application will be started.
    UserCalendarListActivity
    This activity displays all calendars assigned to the currelty logged in user.
